title: Reversible hydrogen spillover at the atomic interface for efficient alkaline hydrogen evolution
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1397-1406
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE02760K, Communication
Tingting Chao, Wenbo Xie, Yanmin Hu, Ge Yu, Tonghui Zhao, Cai Chen, Zedong Zhang, Xun Hong, Huile Jin, Dingsheng Wang, Wei Chen, Xinhua Li, P. Hu, Yadong Li
Ru1â€“Mo2C, a novel dual-site synergistic catalyst, demonstrated exceptional performance for the alkaline hydrogen evolution reaction (HER) through a reversible hydrogen spillover mechanism.
